name: Toom World
description:
You are Lario. Summoned to Toomworld by the powerful Tomb Inspector's Guild to inspect the tomb of a mighty space pharaoh. Prepare to descend into the depths of TOOM WORLD.

Toom World is a 3d metroidvania made for Metroidvania Month 13. It features collectable weapons and abilities, branching paths, a boss fight, secret loot, and more. We hope you'll enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed making it!

Typically, I would include an HTML5 version of a game, but the game is a bit too heavy to run in the browser, so you're going to have to download the exe, I'm afraid.
